info.title: Infoblox RPZ API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI RPZ objects

get.description: Returns a list of allrpzrecords objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object. Note that this value might be different than the value of the name field for the associated record.

parameters.name: rpz_rule
parameters.description: The RPZ rule type of the record associated with the allrpzrecrods object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of record associated with the allrpzrecords object. This is a descriptive string that identifies the record to which this allrpzrecords object refers. (Examples: 'record:rpz:a', 'record:rpz:mx', etc.)

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The DNS view name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The Response Policy Zone name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

get.description: Returns a specific allrpzrecords object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the allrpzrecords object

get.description: Returns a list of record:rpz:a objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

parameters.name: ipv4addr
parameters.description: The IPv4 Address of the substitute rule.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

parameters.name: reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the record:rpz:a object

delete.description: Deletes a specific record:rpz:a object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the record:rpz:a object

parameters.name: preference
parameters.description: Preference value, 0 to 65535 (inclusive) in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

get.description: Returns a list of record:rpz:naptr objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

parameters.name: flags
parameters.description: The flags used to control the interpretation of the fields for a Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object. Supported values for the flags field are "U", "S", "P" and "A".

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order parameter of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule records. This parameter specifies the order in which the NAPTR rules are applied when multiple rules are present. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: preference
parameters.description: The preference of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule record. The preference field determines the order NAPTR records are processed when multiple records with the same order parameter are present. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description: The replacement field of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object. For nonterminal NAPTR records, this field specifies the next domain name to look up. This value can be in unicode format.

parameters.name: services
parameters.description: The services field of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object; maximum 128 characters. The services field contains protocol and service identifiers, such as "http+E2U" or "SIPS+D2T".

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the record:rpz:naptr object

parameters.name: ptrdname

parameters.name: view

parameters.name: zone

get.description: Returns a list of record:rpz:srv objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: The priority of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule in FQDN format. This value can be in unicode format.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

get.description: Returns a list of record:rpz:txt objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text associated with the record. It can contain up to 255 bytes per substring, up to a total of 512 bytes. To enter leading, trailing, or embedded spaces in the text, add quotes around the text to preserve the spaces.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

alert_type.description: The alert type of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

comment.description: The descriptive comment of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

disable.description: The disable flag of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object (if present).

expiration_time.description: The expiration time of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

last_updated.description: The time when the record associated with the allrpzrecords object was last updated.

name.description: The name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object. Note that this value might be different than the value of the name field for the associated record.

record.description: The record object associated with the allrpzrecords object.

rpz_rule.description: The RPZ rule type of the record associated with the allrpzrecrods object.

ttl.description: The TTL value of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object (if present).

type.description: The type of record associated with the allrpzrecords object. This is a descriptive string that identifies the record to which this allrpzrecords object refers. (Examples: 'record:rpz:a', 'record:rpz:mx', etc.)

view.description: The DNS view name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

zone.description: The Response Policy Zone name of the record associated with the allrpzrecords object.

oneOf.title: UpdateAllrpzrecordsResponse

comment.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

ipv4addr.description: The IPv4 Address of the substitute rule.

name.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

rp_zone.description: The name of a response policy zone in which the record resides.

ttl.description: The Time To Live (TTL) value for record. A 32-bit unsigned integer that represents the duration, in seconds, for which the record is valid (cached). Zero indicates that the record should not be cached.

view.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

oneOf.title: UpdateRecordRpzMxResponse

comment.description: The comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

flags.description: The flags used to control the interpretation of the fields for a Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object. Supported values for the flags field are "U", "S", "P" and "A".

last_queried.description: The time of the last DNS query in Epoch seconds format.

name.description: The name for a record in FQDN format. This value cannot be in unicode format.

order.description: The order parameter of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule records. This parameter specifies the order in which the NAPTR rules are applied when multiple rules are present. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

preference.description: The preference of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule record. The preference field determines the order NAPTR records are processed when multiple records with the same order parameter are present. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

regexp.description: The regular expression-based rewriting rule of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule record. This should be a POSIX compliant regular expression, including the substitution rule and flags. Refer to RFC 2915 for the field syntax details.

replacement.description: The replacement field of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object. For nonterminal NAPTR records, this field specifies the next domain name to look up. This value can be in unicode format.

rp_zone.description: The name of a response policy zone in which the record resides.

services.description: The services field of the Substitute (NAPTR Record) Rule object; maximum 128 characters. The services field contains protocol and service identifiers, such as "http+E2U" or "SIPS+D2T".

ttl.description: The Time To Live (TTL) value for record. A 32-bit unsigned integer that represents the duration, in seconds, for which the record is valid (cached). Zero indicates that the record should not be cached.

view.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.

port.description: The port of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

priority.description: The priority of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

target.description: The target of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule in FQDN format. This value can be in unicode format.

ttl.description: The Time To Live (TTL) value for record. A 32-bit unsigned integer that represents the duration, in seconds, for which the record is valid (cached). Zero indicates that the record should not be cached.

view.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides. Example: "external".

weight.description: The weight of the Substitute (SRV Record) Rule. Valid values are from 0 to 65535 (inclusive), in 32-bit unsigned integer format.

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides. Example: "zone.com". If a view is not specified when searching by zone, the default view is used.
